document_data.name: Spider
document_data.mainbody: '''Spider''' was a delivery boy in the [[Skullport/Lower Port|Lower Port]] of [[Skullport]].
document_data.Personality: Spider was overconfident, brash, and arrogant.
document_data.History: Spider, a name he chose for himself, was a street child of Skullport, not knowing anything about his heritage. In time, he discovered that he was very good at climbing and took work as a delivery boy with his ability. By [[1370 DR]], he founded [[Spider's Fleet o' Feet]] and started wondering about his origins discovering himself not to be a [[half-elf]], like he had always thought.
